util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides basic file related utility methods for opening, closing, reading, appending, writing text with or without line breaks, etc.
    Author:
    gsanthan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void appendLineToFile(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String line)
      Opens the specified file using a BufferedWriter in append mode, appends the line at the end of the file, and closes the file
      static void closeFile(java.io.BufferedWriter writer)
      Closes the writer
      static void closeResultFile()
      Loses the log file
      static void copyFile(java.io.File sourceFile, java.io.File destFile)
      Copies the sourceFile to the destFile.
      static void logNewLine()
      Writes a new line into the log file
      static void logResult(java.lang.String string)
      Writes the specified string into the log file
      static java.io.BufferedWriter openFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Opens the specified file using a BufferedWriter
      static java.io.BufferedWriter openFileForAppend(java.lang.String fileName)
      Opens the specified file using a BufferedWriter in append mode
      static java.io.BufferedReader openFileForRead(java.lang.String fileName)
      Opens the specified file using a BufferedReader
      static java.io.BufferedWriter openResultFile(java.lang.String file)
      Opens the log file for writing in append mode and returns a BufferedWriter
      static java.io.BufferedWriter openResultFileWithSuffix(java.lang.String file, java.lang.String suffix)
      Opens the log file + suffix for writing in append mode and returns a BufferedWriter
      static void writeLinesToFile(java.lang.String[] lines, java.lang.String fileName)
      Opens the given file and writes the specified lines one at a time, each followed by a new line.
      static void writeLineToFile(java.io.BufferedWriter writer, java.lang.String line)
      Writes the given line followed by a new line using the specified writer
      static void writeToFile(java.io.BufferedWriter writer, java.lang.String line)
      Writes the given line without new line using the specified writer

      • copyFile

        public static void copyFile(java.io.File sourceFile,
            java.io.File destFile)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Copies the sourceFile to the destFile. If the destFile does not exist, a new one is created. Uses a FileChannel 'fast copy' implementation.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile -
        destFile -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
